headline: South Korea Makes Exception To Allow K-Pop Royalty in BTS To Avoid Conscription, for Now
text: SEOUL, South Korea — Kim Seok-jin, the oldest member of the global K-pop phenomenon​ BTS​, turns 28 on Friday. On Tuesday, South Korea’s Parliament gave him an early birthday present.
snippet: The oldest member of BTS was saved at the last minute from having to join the military under the country’s conscription system.
